subject: Damaged Yellow 70HA Elastomer – Request for Replacement
description_text:
Hi Simsonn Support Team,

I've been using my pedals for about 2 weeks now, and unfortunately, I've
already noticed that my yellow 70HA elastomer has torn. Its not fully
cracked, its still more or less usable but it might tore apart with further
use.

I’ve only been using the pedals normally, so I’m a bit surprised this
happened so soon. Is it possible to get a replacement for the damaged
elastomer?

Youl find my invoice from Amazon attached. (Its in German, because I live
in Austria)

Thanks in advance for your help!

Best regards,
Marcel

conversations.body_text:
Heres a picture of the damaged elastomer
Ive just realised that the second elaltomer has a very small crack as well






Marcel Rosenberg <marcel.rosenberg2006@gmail.com> schrieb am Di., 24. Juni
2025, 12:36:

> Hi Simsonn Support Team,
>
> I've been using my pedals for about 2 weeks now, and unfortunately, I've
> already noticed that my yellow 70HA elastomer has torn. Its not fully
> cracked, its still more or less usable but it might tore apart with further
> use.
>
> I’ve only been using the pedals normally, so I’m a bit surprised this
> happened so soon. Is it possible to get a replacement for the damaged
> elastomer?
>
> Youl find my invoice from Amazon attached. (Its in German, because I live
> in Austria)
>

>

>
>
>

你好，Marcel Rosenberg，  我会让我们的销售团队明天给您寄一套替换的黄色减震器（三个）。发货后我们会提供追踪号码给您。

Hi, thank you very much for your quick reply!
I really appreciate that you're sending me the replacement yellow dampers.
Thanks again for the great support!
Best regards,
Marcel Rosenberg


service@simsonn.com
你好，Marcel Rosenberg，  这是您的跟踪号 YT2517600704999829，您可以通过 https://www.yuntrack.com/parcelTracking?id=YT2517600704999829 进行跟踪。
